content: the left side of each ring and under the right side of each ring this part will take some massaging and maneuvering of the outer rings to get everything to lay flat and form a nice circle be sure to use pins to secure your rings while you work if you need once you have a flat circle of rings woven together with the color c ribbon sew the two ends of the ribbon to form a circle border blo single_crochet around the outside of the rings making sure to blo single_crochet together one stitch from each ring where each ring overlaps
